pullRequest.title: Skip upload of unchanged application content
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description:

Skip upload of unchanged app content if the last staging of the
application was successful.
Issue: 
LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1851

nodes.bodyText: This call is already made on line 156. Could we reuse the CloudApplication?

Better naming of the variable.
Also, could you extract StepsUtil.getUploadToken(execution.getContext()) into separate variable?
Is this necessarry to be info message?

commit.message:
Skip upload of unchanged application content

Skip upload of unchanged app content if the last staging of the
application was successful.
